businessInfo.companyNameTooltip: Teie te huru tā te mau tā'ata tere e 'ite ai i tō fare tū'aro

credentials.missingCredentialsText: Fa'a'ite i te 'ā'ō VAI no te fa'aara'a tiketī fare tū'aro, palapala haumaru moni, pe te taotoga mata'u māta'i tohora.

billing.paymentInfoText: Te mau fa'aafaro e ravehia i te āva'e ta'ato'a. Fa'a'ite i te 'ā'ō VAI no te fa'atū fa'aafaro e te faturera'a.

healthDescriptions.excellent: Tō fare tū'aro e tiapura nei! 'Aita te taui!
healthDescriptions.good: Ne'ine'ira'a maitai. Te mau fa'ahouara'a 'ī e nehenehe ai te fa'arahi i tō mālo'o.
healthDescriptions.needsImprovement: Fa'anahote'a i te taime 'ā'amu e te profil oti no te fa'arahi i tō tupura'a.

validation.companyNameRequired: I'oa fare tū'aro e ti'a roa

messages.profileNotFound: Profil 'ore i 'ite hia. Fa'a'ite mai i te 'ā'ō.
messages.conflictingInfo: Teie fa'ahōho'ara'a e pa'ari nei e te ta'oto'a rē. Māta'i i tō mau 'ite.
messages.noPermission: 'Aita tō 'ā'au no te fa'ahou i teie profil. Fa'a'ite i te 'ā'ō.
messages.updateError: 'Aore e nehenehe te fa'aora i te mau taui. 'A fa'aauau pe fa'a'ite i te 'ā'ō ina mau ai te piha'e.
messages.securityPolicyError: Fa'ahou pa'ari: Te ture haumaru database ua fa'a'ore i te fa'ahouara'a. Fa'a'ite mai i te 'ā'ō i hello@vai.studio no te fa'atū i tō mau 'ā'au.

hero.title: Tauturu Hopea Roa • Plateforme Tāpū Noa
hero.subtitle: TE Plateforme Mau roa no te Taata Haamaitai Pōrīnetia Atoa

revenue.title: Récupération des Revenus
revenue.description: Eita te pohe ai to moni na roto i te annulation roa. VAI na roto e taui atu ai oe i te taurearea e hinaaro e faaea i te mau taime pohe ia.

instant.title: Découverte Instantanée
instant.description: Te taurearea nei e imi nei i te mau tamaraa mau i Pōrīnetia farāni NEI RA. E ite rahi mai ratou ia oe ina hinaaro e tāpū.
instant.benefit: Aita te système de réservation e hinaaro ai

mood.title: Tauturu ma te Uiui
mood.description: Hou roa: Te taurearea e haapii mai nei i ta ratou uiui (Tamaraa, Haamaitai, Culture, Moana) a ua faaite atu matou i TO tamaraa!
mood.benefit: Tauturu maita'i i te taime atoa

commission.title: Commission Iti Roa
commission.description: Poloke i te 89% o to moni ma to matou 11% commission structure

noSetup.title: Aita te Setup Faafaito
noSetup.description: Poloke i ta oe mau taime tupe. Tuku i ta oe disponibilité ina nehenehe

liveChat.title: Chat Direct Intégré
liveChat.description: Communication directe avec les touristes via notre système de chat

realTime.title: Notifications en Temps Réel
realTime.description: Alertes vave no te mau réservation, confirmation e te mau message client

dualPreview.title: Piti Plateforme Mana. Hookahi Expérience Maita'i.
dualPreview.touristSide: To mau taata taurearea e ite
dualPreview.description: Découverte nehenehe ma te uiui e tuu e tauturu professional operator

activityTypes.title: Te Mau Tamaraa Atoa Maeva Mai
activityTypes.wrapper: Nō ia 'ohipa, tō na iho nuna'a
activityTypes.subtitle: Mai te mau tamaraa moana e tae atu i te mau workshop culture - te tamaraa atoa e ite i tana mau taata

professional.title: Tableau de Bord Professionnel
professional.description: Suivi revenus, gestion réservations e confirmations automatiques - Tomora'a moni 'ore nō te mau VAI Operator ato'a. 'Aita e hau ha'amau'ara'a.

experience.title: Expérience Client Nehenehe
experience.description: To mau tamaraa e tae atu i te taata ma te correspondance intelligent uiui e temps rahi i te mau appareil atoa
experience.benefit: Te découverte intelligent e rave i te mau réservation rahi

inclusive.title: Te Mau Tamaraa Atoa Maeva Mai
inclusive.description: Mai te mau tamaraa moana e tae atu i te mau workshop culture - te tamaraa atoa e ite i tana audience maita'i ma to matou plateforme
inclusive.benefit: Aita e aha ta oe e rave, e tauturu atu matou ia oe i te mau client maita'i

multiLanguage.title: Interface Multilingue
multiLanguage.description: Support Français, English, Tahiti, Español, Italiano, Deutsch no te portée mondiale

compliance.title: Conformité Réglementaire
compliance.description: Gestion intégrée règlements 2025 observation tohora e normes sécurité

cta.title: E Hinaaro e Haamaitai i to Business?
cta.description: E uru mai i te mau hanere operator Pōrīnetia e faaite nei ia VAI e haamaitai i ta ratou moni
cta.getAccess: E Rave i te Accès Gratuit Teie nei

modal.voluntarySubtitle: Faahou i to upoo no te haumaruraa.
